channel.title: Galaxy of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the galaxy of the day.

item.title: Pegasus Dwarf Spheroidal Galaxy
item.description: The Pegasus Dwarf Spheroidal (also known as Andromeda VI or Peg dSph for short) is a dwarf spheroidal galaxy about 2.7 million light-years away in the constellation Pegasus. The Pegasus Dwarf is a member of the Local Group and a satellite galaxy of the Andromeda Galaxy (M31).
